"Amazing staff, great design selections, and very good communication." "Caleb's design skills and customer service were exceptional." "Great people, great service and the pools are awesome"

Excellent experience from start to finish. Caleb made a real effort to understand our needs and translate them into a design that fit exactly what we were looking for. Very attentive, thoughtful, and easy to communicate with. Would definitely recommend. More

I was very satisfied with the remodeling of my pool, deck and patio, from initial contact with Selah through to its completion.  Caleb, the sales associate/designer,  took the time to answer our questions about the pool components.  John, … More

Wow, we can't say enough good things about Selah Pools! They turned our backyard into a total paradise, and the whole experience was stress free. We obtained several quotes and designs from other pool companies before deciding on Selah. … More
